cac:ProcurementProject.cbc:Name: Provision of Talent Management Consultancy and Coaching Services
cac:ProcurementProject.cbc:Description: Dublin Bus seeks to appoint a vendor/s as part of a multi party framework agreement to provide consultancy services in talent selection, assessment and development, and design of HR policies and procedures, to support the HR Departments overall strategy. The contract will be for a period of three years. Two further individual one year extensions to the contract may be allowed on the agreement of both Dublin Bus and the service provider. The tender will be divided into 4 different lots, tenderers can apply for one, some or all lots.
